task.name: r3.univar
task.label: Calculates univariate statistics from the non-null cells of a 3D raster map.
task.description: Statistics include number of cells counted, minimum and maximum cell values, range, arithmetic mean, population variance, standard deviation, coefficient of variation, and sum.

parameter.name: zones
parameter.description: 3D Raster map used for zoning, must be of type CELL

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: Name for output file (if omitted or "-" output to stdout)

parameter.name: percentile
parameter.description: Percentile to calculate (requires extended statistics flag)

parameter.name: separator
parameter.label: Field separator
parameter.description: Special characters: pipe, comma, space, tab, newline

flag.name: g
flag.description: Print the stats in shell script style

flag.name: t
flag.description: Table output format instead of standard output format

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Allow output files to overwrite existing files
